channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Reverse Proxy Auth Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Reverse Proxy Auth Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-45384|2024-08-03T14:09:56.960Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20reverse%20proxy%20auth%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Reverse Proxy Auth Plugin 1.7.3 and earlier stores the LDAP manager password unencrypted in the global config.xml file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by attackers with access to the Jenkins controller file system.
